stories.text: Hi HN, we have recently completed a research project on how to encrypt emails with post-quantum secure algorithms as well as Forward Secrecy. We'd love to hear your feedback and discuss technical issues. The paper can be found here: https://eprint.iacr.org/2021/875
stories.title: Show HN: Encrypted emails based on Signal protocol with post-quantum algorithms

stories.text: I am recently receiving new type of spam in my gmail inbox that I am not able to filter. The particularity is in the file attached which is an .html (body is often empty, random email and from as always). Spam is lending in my main inbox, and would like to simple filter all email containing html files. But we can't add a custom filter on filename, can we ?
stories.title: Ask HN: Un-filterable new type of SPAMs in Gmail
